name: California Taco Dip
author: Inge
summary: There are many taco bean dips, but this one has a secret ingredient that makes is extra yummy...mayonnaise. It gives it a very creamy taste. Try it... bet you will like it!
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix (such as Lawry's®)
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
directions: In a bowl, mash the avocados and mix in the lemon juice
In a separate bowl, mix the sour cream, mayonnaise, and
Spread the refried beans over the bottom of a large serving platter or bowl
Spread sour cream mixture over the avocado, and sprinkle with cheese
Layer cheese with green onions (just the green part), then tomatoes, and top with the olives
Cover, and chill in the refrigerator 2 to 4 hours before serving
